landing.bio: Currently I am working on building and testing Decentralized applications on the Ethereum blockchain.

experience.aboutWork: Automated the decommissioning process for virtual hosting environments using Python and PowerShell
Completed the SDLC for building an information system for a law firm in Greenville, NC

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy researching about blockchain technology and the different use-cases behind it
interests.paragraphTwo: I'm also very interested in researching investment opportunities in stocks, commodities, cryptocurrencies, and Forex
interests.paragraphThree: In my free time I like to run and workout, game, and spend time with friends on campus

projects.projectDetail: Create and buy tickets for events using a decentralized application on the Ropsten Test Network
Create posts and tip post authors for their content on the Ropsten Test Network
Create Bets and Bet with other players using an Ethereum smart contract. IN PROGRESS!
